<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>64659</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_526</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_526</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Poliedros</string>
            <string language="en">Polyhedron</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polyeder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Polyèdre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Polyhedron</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Poliedro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Polyhedron</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los poliedros. Se estudian los diferentes tipos de poliedros, la fórmula de Euler y las fórmulas más sencillas para calcular los volúmenes de algunos poliedros, tales como cubos, prismas y pirámides.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain polyhedra. It studies different types of polyhedra, Euler's formula and other simple formula to calculate the volumes of some polyhedra such as cubes, prisms and pyramids.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">pirámide</string>
            <string language="en">pyramid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">volumen</string>
            <string language="en">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">poliedro</string>
            <string language="en">polyhedra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">prisma</string>
            <string language="en">prism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">fórmula de Euler</string>
            <string language="en">Euler's formula</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Polyeder zu erklären. Sie studiert 
unterschiedliche Typen der Polyeder, der Formel Eulers und anderer 
einfacher Formel, um die Datenträger einiger Polyeder wie Würfel, 
Prismen und Pyramiden zu errechnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer des polyèdres. Elle étudie différents
types des polyèdres, de la formule d'Euler et de toute autre formule 
simple pour calculer les volumes de certains polyèdres tels que des 
cubes, des prismes et des pyramides.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
polyhedra. Estuda tipos diferentes de polyhedra, de fórmula de 
Euler e da outra fórmula simples para calcular os volumes de alguns 
polyhedra tais como cubos, prismas e pirâmides.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare i poliedri. Studia i tipi differenti di poliedri, di 
formula del Euler e di altre formule semplici per calcolare i volumi 
di alcuni poliedri quali i cubi, i prismi e le piramidi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει polyhedra. Μελετά τους διαφορετικούς 
τύπους polyhedra, τύπων Euler και άλλων απλών τύπων για να 
υπολογίσει τις εντάσεις του ήχου μερικά polyhedra όπως οι 
κύβοι, τα πρίσματα και οι πυραμίδες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pyramide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Datenträger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polyeder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Formel Eulers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pyramide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">polyèdres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">prisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La formule d'Euler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pirâmide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">polyhedra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fórmula de Euler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poliedri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formula del Euler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πυραμίδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ένταση του ήχου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">polyhedra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρίσμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύπος Euler</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
